T02D2810:166a-0: @166a * // thugs rje chen po bum pa bzang po can la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2810:166a-1: gter chen bum pa gser gyi mchog / dpag bsam shing ltar 'gro ba yi //
T02D2810:166a-2: re bzhin yal ga bzad dgyed pa //
T02D2810:166a-3: de yi dbus bzhugs nyid dpal 'dud //
T02D2810:166a-4: gang yang sgrub po blo gros che //
T02D2810:166a-5: dad dang ldan yang dbul gyur pa //
T02D2810:166a-6: de dag gis ni 'byor pa dang //
T02D2810:166a-7: dngos grub lhan cig 'phags pa bsgrub //
T02D2810:166a-8: re zhig phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas sam bum pa
T02D2810:166a-9: bzang po lta bu'i dbyibs kyi gzhir de dang 'dra
T02D2810:166a-10: ba'i bsam gtan gyi khang bu bcos la /
T02D2810:166a-11: gang du 'jug pa'i mal du mtshan nyid phun sum tshogs pa'i bum pa bris te /
T02D2810:166a-12: rab tu gnas pa'i bkra shis gsol bar bya'o //
T02D2810:166a-13: de nas zla ba nya la bab pa na spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snyan gsan phab la /
T02D2810:166a-14: zla ba gcig gi bar tshangs par spyod pas btsun pa dka' thub chen po can mnyes par bya'o //
T02D2810:166a-15: slad kyis yang zla ba rgyas pa'i nyin mor gyur pa na /
T02D2810:166a-17: skra dang kha spu ni bcos /
T02D2810:166a-19: rol mo mang po ni dkrol te /
T02D2810:166b-0: @166b 'phags pa'i rten la phyag dang bskor ba la sogs pa bya zhing /
T02D2810:166b-1: snying gar hr'i: bsams nas de'i 'od kyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs bum pa la bstim mo //
T02D2810:166b-2: gzhal med khang mchog rin chen bum pa bzang 'khyil la //
T02D2810:166b-3: lha rdzas mgul bcings yid bzhin yal ga 'bras bus brgyan //
T02D2810:166b-4: de dbus sdong bu me tog au dum b'a ra'i rtser //
T02D2810:166b-5: 'jig rten gsum skyob dmar mdzes nor gyi rgyun can bsgom //
T02D2810:166b-6: dpag med lo 'dab me tog tshogs 'khrungs padma'i yang //
T02D2810:166b-7: ge sar rtse la rgyal sras chos mang ston pa dang //
T02D2810:166b-8: rtse dga' mchod pa'i lha tshogs rnam par 'phro ba yis //
T02D2810:166b-9: sa 'dir ma lus cig car cho 'phrul rnam par 'phrul //
T02D2810:166b-10: mig gi rdzi bskyod rkang pa ya gcig bteg pa dang /
T02D2810:166b-11: lag pa dkur brten 'dzum pa'i mdangs legs 'gying ba sogs //
T02D2810:166b-12: mi yi bu mo bzhin bzangs rnams kyang bka' bsgo la //
T02D2810:166b-13: bu bzangs mdun byas 'phags pa mchod la brtson par bya //
T02D2810:166b-14: aom a'a:hr'i: sarba buddha ni ma riddhi ratna dha ra
T02D2810:166b-15: dha ra dhi ri dhi ri dhu ru dhu ru
T02D2810:166b-16: badzra dzny'a na k'a ru na ye /
T02D2810:166b-17: ratna gha ta bha dra sam p'urba /
T02D2810:166b-18: su sam p'urna ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02D2810:166b-19: srung skud dri ldan lag tu thogs //
T02D2810:166b-20: me tog phreng bas mgo bcings la //
T02D2810:166b-21: rnal 'byor ldan pas sngags bzla zhing //
T02D2810:166b-22: bum bzangs las ni dngos grub blang //
T02D2810:166b-23: dkar nag phyed phyed phyogs kun la //
T02D2810:166b-24: dbul po tshim par bya ba dang //
T02D2810:166b-25: rnyed pa'i dang pos bla ma mchod //
T02D2810:166b-26: kun la chags med mchod sbyin spyad //
